title: The Lost Vikings under Dosbox
content:
Perhaps I did something wrong before, but I suspect it's the DOSBox people that did something right With their latest release:
[url=http://dosbox.sourceforge.net/]dosbox.sourceforge.net/[/url]

I'm talking about The Lost Vikings (of which you can play a demo, since it's since been remade for the GBA here [url=http://www.blizzard.com/blizzclassic/vikingsdemo.shtml]www.blizzard.com/blizzcla...demo.shtml[/url] ).
Before, even loading the intro would take ages, the music would skip every 1.5 notes, and the game was anything but playable.
I tried again with the latest version, and now everything runs quite nicely.
(I use a regular Sound Blaster instead of a Sound Blaster Pro, since the latter just sounds wrong in the intro music.)
In case anybody cares, there is my tip! Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten.
